description:
#####Version 1.2.0 Added backup feature, now you can send logs to your email.#####

ABOUT
•	Measuring your Cholesterol level can helps you and your doctor control Cholesterol and its many complications.
•	The Cholesterol Tracker simplifies Cholesterol data (Cholesterol level, HDL level, LDL level) logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple Cholesterol readings at different times of a day.
•	 This app saves the Cholesterol level, HDL level, LDL level, time of the measurement and note.
•	In addition to being a convenient data logger the software is also a voluble tool for Cholesterol level, HDL level, LDL level longitudinal trends analysis using graphs.
•	 This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.

  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes Cholesterol level, HDL level, LDL level over time on the longitudinal graphs.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.

  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes Cholesterol level, HDL level, LDL level over time on the longitudinal graphs.
